website_summaries.verdict: While it doesn’t quite match the ITP 56A304 Mud Lite or Bearclaw in terms of durability off-road, the Scorpion is the ideal tire for lighter-duty applications.
pros: Performs exceptionally well on golf carts, and is the tire of choice on the green
cons: As is obvious by the tread design, it will not perform well splashing through the mud or moving snow

customer_reviews.title: Lawn Mowers Should have these as stock
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the 20x10-8 Kenda Scorpion K290 Rear ATV Tire for the rear of my Cub Cadet lawn mower. These worked well except they had so much traction that when I turned sharp the stock front tires lost traction and the mower would continue in a straight line. With that said I decided to buy these for the front as well. These tires don't tear up the lawn and grip very well. I couldn't be happier with these purchases. Highly recommended. Pros: Way better traction Does not damage lawn Faster cutting time Great price Cons: None Note: Should have purchased these years ago. Make grass cutting fun.
customer_reviews.author: Vibration

customer_reviews.title: No more sliding
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these based on the other reviews. I could not be happier! I have a zero turn Husqvarna 54” mower that used to slide down the hills with the stock tires. These things are a perfect tire between the stock turf saver, and something with an aggressive tread. You have to be a bit careful on the turns in wet grass, but otherwise fantastic! They don’t seem to sacrifice the ride as well. No more sliding! I bet you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: keith s.

customer_reviews.title: Golf cart no longer slips on paved steep hill.
customer_reviews.text: I have a steep paved path that goes to my boat dock. When the weather turned cold, my golf cart would spin and slip at a big turn. Took these tires to Walmart and replaced my 18x8.50-8 with 18x9.5-8 and no slip or spin. Was nervous about them working, but am very happy with the results. I may put them on the front as well. The only unknown is durability since they are 2ply and I just got them. The tire said 5 lbs pressure, but it took 10 to fully inflate. Hope that doesn’t cause an issue later.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Young

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tires for slippery slopes.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome is the only way I can describe these. Replaced my 5 year old rear tires for my Husqavarna riding mower. The old ones were turf tires and I slipped on hills a lot. If your yard has any kind of slope or hills in your yard, these tires are perfect for climbing. I installed them yesterday and mulches leaves in yard and did not slip once. First time ever.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good, aggressive tire for a lawn tractor
customer_reviews.text: I had an old tractor with typical Turf Saver tires on it. When the old tires dry rotted to the point where they wouldn't hold air any more, I started looking at options. These tires ended up being slightly less expensive than lawn tractor tires. I have a hilly lawn, and the aggressive tread pattern actually tears it up LESS because the tires are less likely to spin and throw clods of dirt around. They held up fine for the entire time I had the tractor. When I finally scrapped it, the tires were like new. When (if) my new tractor needs tires, I'll be buying these or something like them.
customer_reviews.author: Zero Signal

customer_reviews.title: Max traction for zero turn
customer_reviews.text: Love it for my zero turn. I live on hilly property with some swampy spots I can go straight up a hill or across a bog with ease. Sharp fast turns will mess up the grass a little bit. But I'm not running a golf course here. Also great price.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: These tires provide awesome grip on my lawn tractor
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble climbing the hill in my backyard on my lawn tractor with it's original lawnsavers. I originally had 8 1/2 wide tires, and managed to squeeze these 9 1/2 tires on. Since I put these new tires on, I tried several times to get stuck on the hill and was only able to do so backing up the steepest part of the hill. I was a bit worried that these would tear the lawn up but I had no issues with that. The rubber is a bit softer than that on lawnsavers so they might not last as long, but they seem like a great investment at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Spyrides

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement tire
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace the original worn tires on my Toro ZX440 ZTR lawn tractor. Very good replacement tire. UPDATE: I purchased these replacement tires for my Toro ZTR lawn tractor before the 2016 mowing season, so I was able to run them the entire season. While these are quality tires, I found using them on a ZTR they will easily TEAR UP lawn. Zero turning/pivoting a ZTR tractor is different from making a turn with a conventional lawn tractor. You/ve been warned
customer_reviews.author: michlind

customer_reviews.title: Great tires for lawnmowers
customer_reviews.text: I used these to replace my 20x8-8 tires on my lawnmower. They fit the rims fine, and get great traction. Even though the contact patch is smaller due to the rounded tread (vice the square-shouldered turfmaster tires), the knob tread pattern gives me great traction on the steep hills and wet spots in my lawn without tearing out any grass. The traction is so good, I took the mower deck off and was able to pull the front tires of my lawnmower off the ground when starting in 6th gear on my gravel driveway. If you want to pop wheelies with your riding lawnmower, these are the tires for you!
customer_reviews.author: JW in AZ

customer_reviews.title: YES!!!
customer_reviews.text: I put these on the rear of my Craftsman LT 2000 lawn tractor and Carlisle holeshot on the front. I highly recommend doing this for hilly property. No more spinning! It can actually pop wheelies where it used to spin only. I thought it might take getting used to the new look, but the tractor wears them well. In retrospect, it looked pathetic with turf tires. It took me, inexperienced with tires and no tire change tools per se, about 1 hr per tire change, but that includes setup and cleanup. .
customer_reviews.author: Daniel H.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a replacement for the Carlisle "turf savers" that came on my Toro SS5000 zero turn mower. Huge difference. I was afraid these would tear up the grass like the stock tires but the opposite has happened. The turf saver compound was harder and the nubs shorter putting more surface area on the grass resulting in "tearing". The tread design on the Scorpions is deeper with a softer compound giving the right amount of flex that doesn't damage my hilly lawn and gets me up 30+ degree inclines with no wheel spin. It's like a new mower.
customer_reviews.author: t.w. escher

customer_reviews.title: I have some pretty steep hills on my property
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I have some pretty steep hills on my property. My mower would constantly drive part of the way up and then it would start slipping and I would have to back down. These tires have made me feel confident again that I can mow all of my lawn. I would recommend these to anyone who has ever had any slippage from their mower tires.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hennessy

customer_reviews.title: Great traction, works on a tractor
customer_reviews.text: I mounted these tires on my lawn tractor and they give me tons more traction over the old turf saver tires. They seem to be quite good quality because even after spinning tires in the gravel a couple times, the tiny little rubber hairs still haven't worn off of the nubs. The old tires were 18x8.5-8, and I can confirm that this slightly bigger tire mounted on the rims just fine and (at least for my tractor) the little bit of extra width causes no problem at all with clearances when mounted on the tractor.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Incorrectly advertised
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely not a 14.5/7-6, they are 145/70-6 which is a 14"/5 r6 tire, not even close to a 7 inch wide tire, also these are definitely front tires, they are not flat as pictured but rather peaked tread
customer_reviews.author: lmphillips

customer_reviews.title: Now I can go uphill on my lawn tractor!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tires for my 1987 John Deere 180 to replace the Carlisle turf tires that were on the back. The Kenda tires are much more aggressive, and as you might expect they will dig holes if you're not careful, but just being able to make it up the hills in my yard for the first time is well worth the risk of tearing up the grass here and there. Before, I had to lean really hard the the wheel that was providing traction just to move. Now...no problem!
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Be should to get the right size for your wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Had the install done by my local shop. Didn’t have the fundamental to do it. Otherwise these tires are the answer to my riding mower problem. I dread every time I cut the grass when I have to go on a hill. My stock tires slipped and slid, spin and stayed going nowhere. That’s all in the past. With these tires I can do everything I couldn’t do before. Slipped and slid, NOPE! Spin and stayed going nowhere, NOPE! Should have gotten them long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size. These are 14x6-6.
customer_reviews.text: I just got these delivered and was surprised to find out the advertised tire size is incorrect. The size stated on the listing is 14.5x7-6. The actual size is 145x70-6 which when converted is actually 14x6-6. They are noticeably smaller than advertised.. this needs to be changed on the listing. I am going to make them work as I don't have time now to deal with returning them, but it's still a bummer I'm running on smaller tires than before. If the listing gets changed, I'll change this review to reflect the actual tire performance.
customer_reviews.author: Just

customer_reviews.title: Great traction on the slick grass.
customer_reviews.text: The factory Tires were starting to dry rot and I would also have some traction issues on one of the hills. With these new tires I have no issues at all. If your yard is soft you will see your tracks from the more aggressive tread. However, that is a fair trade in my opinion vs slipping on the hill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ever riding mower should come with these tires straight outta factory!
customer_reviews.text: No more spinning wheels uphill. No more spinning in reverse. No more spinning on wet and humid grass. These tires are the bomb. Every riding mower should come with these tires out of the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: Got these as replacements for my zero turn's tires. ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these as replacements for my zero turn's tires. Significantly improved my traction, doesn't slide as much on a slope, but will certainly pull up the grass if you start to spin... Slow controlled turns and caution in slightly rougher terrain or hills or you will dig a trench.
customer_reviews.author: DWC01

customer_reviews.title: Good tires. Using on front of golf cart that ...
customer_reviews.text: Good tires. Using on front of golf cart that is used for ranch work. They ride softer than golf cart tires. Put about a quart of slime in each. Been about a year and no flats yet. Live in Texas...lots of misquites, nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: great tires
customer_reviews.text: These are great tires on my go kart. only reason why I gave it 4 stars is because the tires came smashed. other than that these are a great buy and I would recommend them to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon seiber

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Dad needed new tires for his golf cart... I ordered these Monday night and he already received them today... Thursday! Seriously... unbelievable service, product and customer service... will definitely use these guys again. These tires turned my dad's run around town golf cart into an off-roading beast and he honestly is happier with this gift than anything I've ever given him. Thanks for making this early Birthday Present to my Dad perfect... Exceeded all expectations!!!
customer_reviews.author: ccalvo

customer_reviews.title: it is like having a new mower if you were previously using ...
customer_reviews.text: As many have said, it is like having a new mower if you were previously using turf saver tires. I have a Troy-Bilt 50" zero turn i put these on and man, it must have knocked 30-45minutes off of the time it takes to cut our 2 acres. They also mounted easily, and mine did not come smashed up like many said, just banded together. I Left them out in the sun for about an hour before i mounted them.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn MacAnanny

customer_reviews.title: Great Zero Turn Tires if your careful
customer_reviews.text: Love these tires they really help me stay out of the ditches. You have to be easy on your turns though or you'll tear up your grass in a hurry. I'm on a Cub Cadet RZT 50 with the kawasaki engine. So far they were great.
customer_reviews.author: KBMom

customer_reviews.title: Traction plus
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our John Deere mower. We live in hilly country and traction with the factory ties was not good. These tires made such a difference. I can mow anywhere I want to mow. I have not had any issues with tearing up the grass. I am going to order some for our zero turn.
customer_reviews.author: John Lersch

customer_reviews.title: Dirty , dusty , old looking
customer_reviews.text: BUT LOOKED LIKE THEY WERE STORED IN WAREHOUSE FOR YEARS . THEY COULD HAVE SENT ME SOME NEW SHINEY ONE'S. BUT I WORKED IN A TIRE MANUFACTURING PLANT AND I KNOW THAT ( FIRST IN FIRST OUT )
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tires
customer_reviews.text: These are very good tires that I use on my offroad powerchair. My only concern, hence four instead of five stars, is that they tend to wear a bit faster than I would like. Otherwise they are excellent. I've used Kenda tires in other applications as well and have found them to be universally good, so good, that it is a brand I look for when searching for replacement tires.
customer_reviews.author: Tsckey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome on and off road
customer_reviews.text: Love these tires on street or off-road paint to install but well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Leddie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tires, great traction
customer_reviews.text: Tires have great traction, makes riding hills a breeze. They don't damage the grass either. I was able to change them on my own however if you can find a place to do it for you, its worthwhile as not having the proper tools and lack of good equipment can cause a lot of headache.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Decent tire for our lifted golf cart.
customer_reviews.text: They mounted well on our rims. They look decent. The price was decent.
customer_reviews.author: GLS MN COLD

customer_reviews.title: Best tire on the market great grip on street and dirt definitely best tire for the money
customer_reviews.text: Musa Muhammed Baja mb200 Warrior six and a half horse Predator 212cc hopped up straight Tire won't use nothing but
customer_reviews.author: gregory k.

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and as delivered as promised!!!
customer_reviews.text: The tire was as promised. It had a very good price on it and was delivered quicker than expected. I love the tread pattern and the fit was perfect. I also found that locally the ATV Shop is pricey for removing the and mounting the new tire. I went to the local NTB and they did two at about $15 each compared to over $50 at the ATV Shop. I would buy this tire again.
customer_reviews.author: The Man Off The Street

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Great tires and they have a good amount of traction. I put them on my lawn mower so I would quit getting stuck and they made a world of difference. They ride smooth and a light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Way better than factory tires.
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than the factory turf savers that came on my cub. I haven’t gotten a chance to really put them to the test, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Don Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great quality tire perfect front tire on my 3 wheeler
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I used it on my lawnmower, I live on a hill and the turf safe tires do more damage by spinning. I got these knobby tires and they work great no more spinning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good general purpose atv tire
customer_reviews.text: We have Kenda tires on a number of our ATV's and like them. We don't race, we don't go swamping in the rivers with them, we simply use them around the farm and they work very well for that. They make a good cost effective general purpose ATV tire.
customer_reviews.author: Contrary One

customer_reviews.title: Works great on mower
customer_reviews.text: Put these on my lawn mower. Never get stuck now.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very aggressive tire fits perfect on yerf dog go kart.
customer_reviews.author: Kendrick pate

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: For my lawn mower that I should have bought when I purchased the mower
customer_reviews.author: Scott.

customer_reviews.title: Runs great on my RZT50
customer_reviews.text: Runs great on my RZT50. If you're not careful, it can tear up your yard when making sharp turns. Doesn't concern me though. Wish I bought these a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great for hilly lawnmowing
customer_reviews.text: No more spinning on wet hills. Doesn't seem to hurt the lawn at all. They come kind of crushed (to make them smaller to ship), so let them retain their shape before trying to mount them. I took mine to Walmart. Easy.
customer_reviews.author: Fauxlimey

customer_reviews.title: Exact Description
customer_reviews.text: Put these on a zero turn mower. The lugs are too close for sticky mud but are a nice upgrade from the original turf tires.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary K

customer_reviews.title: Great on my zero turn
customer_reviews.text: These really changed everything compared to my turf tires. They dig a little but keep me going side-hill instead of down-hill!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I am very glad with these tires; I put these on my Grasshopper front-mount zero turn mower and traction improved dramatically over the bar tires that were on it. They seem to be easy on the turf as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Applegate

customer_reviews.title: amazing grip on all surfaces I go on
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my ZTR lawn mower, amazing grip on all surfaces I go on. Will continue to buy!
customer_reviews.author: EthanWS6

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: Installed these on my golf cart and now I can go just about any place I want to go. They grip better than any tire I have ever had and seem to be holding the tread very well. Would recommend these and will buy in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald J

customer_reviews.title: Good tire for off road work.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this tire twice now. I wouldn't have but my maintenance tech drove 1/4 mile on a flat and ruined my first one. Good turf traction. These give good traction when hauling a trailer on turf.
customer_reviews.author: Taljr

customer_reviews.title: Great Tire for Atvs or mowers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a zero turn mower as our property is very hilly. you have to pay attention not to dig up the lawn but its much safer even when it s a little wet. good tire, arrived flattened and not folded. Good deal
customer_reviews.author: GMI

customer_reviews.title: great for yamaha raptor 80
customer_reviews.text: place them in the back of my yamaha raptor 80cc instead of the originals that came from factory..sunday ride test pass! a little lower but lots of traction in curves .. love it recommend 100% doGor
customer_reviews.author: ERICSCALE

customer_reviews.title: Good tires!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and fit the grandkids little Honda 70 three wheeler like a champ. Easy to install. I did it on a picnic table in about an hour. Good fit and product!
customer_reviews.author: mike sikora

customer_reviews.title: but its on and works good.
customer_reviews.text: i got a tire with a different tread pattern, but its on and works good.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Go Kart Tires!
customer_reviews.text: These are literally like the tires Ken Block had on his Ford Focus i can drift in the rain just like him and hang sideways!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Grippy
customer_reviews.text: Put them on my lawn tractor. No problem with wheels spinning up the hills now.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie K

customer_reviews.title: Kenda k290 tires
customer_reviews.text: Work far better than turfs, less lawn damage using a Dixon Ztr mower.
customer_reviews.author: WheelHorse74

customer_reviews.title: These are a little softer than I was hoping, ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a little softer than I was hoping, but so far have been doing very well on my zero turn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great traction for my golf cart
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly on my Club Car golf cart. They gave me the extra traction needed to safely drive up and down a large hill.
customer_reviews.author: rdaniels

customer_reviews.title: Excellent traction
customer_reviews.text: I put these on my Dixie Chopper ZTR. Perfect. Excellent traction
customer_reviews.author: Scott Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Get a good grip!
customer_reviews.text: I put these on the back of my lawn tractor so I could more easily navigate my back hill. What a wonderful difference. No more slipping and sliding all over the place. I don't know why I waited so long.
customer_reviews.author: David Barth

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for a hilly lawn
customer_reviews.text: I was constantly getting stuck on my tractor as my lawn is very hilly. I was concerned that maybe these tires would rip up the lawn but they do not. They grip so well that I can actually go faster. No more spinning tires. I am now able to cut my lawn in 75 minutes where it always took me at least 120 minutes on the old tires.
customer_reviews.author: HellsKitchenGadgets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid little tire. Got it to replace the front tire on my Honda atc250sx.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great ATV tires
customer_reviews.text: They are very durable and hold up compared to other similar tires.
customer_reviews.author: Power purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Great tire and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace on my mini bike. My stock tires were 19x7-8 but these 20x7-8 are cheaper and I gained an extra 4mph at top end. I have been putting them through hell and they are still going strong. I live out in the country and these tires even feel real stable at 45+mph. Update. Still using the same tires LOL. Front still looks new rear has a little more wear. I have taken this tire through sand,water,mud,powdered dirt hard pan all except snow. I even had them at 52+mph very stable tire. Seems like they will last me 2 more years. Get them for off roading.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband.. They are fine for what he uses the four wheeler for but they wouldn't be the best for real off roading according to him.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gorrell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for Honda ATC 110 nice soft ride,great traction
customer_reviews.author: Bundy123

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a 1987 honda 250 quad
customer_reviews.text: Put these on my dad's 1987 honda 250 quad sceptically, and it paid off! Can't go wrong with Kenda as a mountain bike tire, and can't go wrong with them as a quad tire.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: great tires
customer_reviews.text: These work awesome for my four wheeler. make sure you get the green goo and they will last for years!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Smith

customer_reviews.title: These tires are absolutely great!!
customer_reviews.text: These tires are absolutely great!!!!! I live by a creek with hills and slopes, and these tires never had an issue!!! I would highly recommend them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Allen Spaulding Jr

customer_reviews.title: vermont
customer_reviews.text: I got them for my rider mower. they work great and don't tear up the lawn.

customer_reviews.title: Killer traction!!
customer_reviews.text: These tires are way better than the stock tires. I can finally mow without sliding all over the place.

customer_reviews.title: but they turned out good, and they look good
customer_reviews.text: I had a little trouble the correct size, but they turned out good, and they look good..
customer_reviews.author: Bill M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent traction. Taller than the tread savers. Had to adjust mower deck.
customer_reviews.author: MrM

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great performance... long wearing even when part of the time I'm on pavement!!
customer_reviews.author: Midwife4Him

customer_reviews.title: I was able to install them myself. They fit very well
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. I installed them on my golf cart myself. The install went very well. Exactly as expected.

customer_reviews.title: Good tires
customer_reviews.text: Good grippy tires on my Suzuki lt125. They seated easy and appear to be good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helped a bunch with traction on zero turn. Not too hard on the yard either

customer_reviews.title: Use on fertilizing machine
customer_reviews.text: Fits a fertilizing machine, my employees really like this tire.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tires
customer_reviews.text: They arrived quickly after ordering and without issue. Excellent traction and would order again
customer_reviews.author: Amanda House

customer_reviews.title: Most excellent! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Used as rear tires on my lawn tractor. Most excellent! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: great off road tire
customer_reviews.text: Just as described works great on my ezgo for a more aggressive tire than stock. Fit well and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Betzwiser

customer_reviews.title: Good tires and good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandson's little Suzuki LT50. With these tires he can get around perfectly now. These tires have a great price, but after adding on the shipping, I have since found that I could have bought the same tires for less at a couple of other web sites. Still, I am pleased with what I got and they should last long past my grandson fitting on his quad runner.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Woods

customer_reviews.title: good tires I put these on my go-cart and they ...
customer_reviews.text: good tires I put these on my go-cart and they give great grip but they will shred grass & destroy your lawn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat the price and the super fast shipping. Work great on my kids go karts.
customer_reviews.author: SteveO

customer_reviews.title: good tires
customer_reviews.text: Fit my golf cart perfectly. I don't play golf but it is a good utility vehicle with these tires. Look good, function as expected in wet muddy trails. May be noisy on the interstate.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Great tires! Highly recommend over cheap tires that came ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tires! Highly recommend over cheap tires that came on the GoKart

customer_reviews.text: works good for lawn and alley running on grandson,s gokart, thanks

customer_reviews.title: Looks like they rip!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't ran the tire yet but it looks like a good knobby. Put on a stock height Yamaha golf cart with no issues.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the tires. Much better than the ones that I originally had. Couldn't be happier Thank you

customer_reviews.title: ATV Tire
customer_reviews.text: I think that this tire is a great price and will work very well for my application and will get good traction on the mini bike.
customer_reviews.author: Visa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good tire just wish they would still make the 15x7
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: these tires are doing a great job. very happy with
customer_reviews.text: bought for my riding mower. was tired of getting stuck on dry grass. these tires are doing a great job. very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better then stock tread for wet or muddy conditions.
customer_reviews.text: These look good, and persorm on the wet grass very well.
customer_reviews.author: Geo. M.

customer_reviews.title: So far these tires have been great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tires to replace the turf tires on my zero turn mower. It has made a huge difference in the handling. I no longer slide down hills or when turning. So far these tires have been great.
